page.title: 11VILLAGE SURVEY - LEISURE
page.content: {HOBBIES AND LEISURE We did a survey on how people spend their leisure time. The most popular activity for the children was sport. This was followed by riding bicycles. The least common were breakdancing, playing the piano,crafts and birdwatching. For the adults the most common hobby was also sport followed by gardening. The least common mentioned by children and adults were sewing,making models, playing musical instruments,shooting, fishing,crafts,farming,knitting and training sheepdogs.
